sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 結論外來人口是深圳市結核病疫情的主要組成部分。

sentences.english: WHO is deeply concerned about the cholera outbreak in Haiti.
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織深切關注海地的霍亂疫情。

sentences.english: 'We have been paying magnificent attention' to the possibility of human illnesses, Mr. Mao said.
sentences.chinese: 毛羣安表示，我們高度重視可能的人感染禽流感疫情。

sentences.english: Outbreaks have also been detected at more farms in Kaduna.
sentences.chinese: 在卡杜納州更多農場也發現了疫情。

sentences.english: That new period comes 30 years into the HIV/AIDS epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 這是艾滋病疫情蔓延了30年後纔出現的新時期。

sentences.english: Through education and awareness-raising activities, China has made great efforts to improve capabilities of the general public of dealing with infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 我們還通過宣傳教育提高人民羣衆應對疫情的能力。

sentences.english: The portable system for quick diagnosis can be deployed during outbreaks to keep them from becoming pandemics.
sentences.chinese: 該系統能在疫情爆發時派上用場，防止疾病流行。

sentences.english: The epidemic situation disseminates from the high-risk group to the common crowd.
sentences.chinese: 疫情從高危人羣向一般人羣傳播。

sentences.english: An epidemic of measles broke out in Chicago this past week.
sentences.chinese: 過去一週，芝加哥爆發痲疹，疫情有擴大趨勢。

sentences.english: We hope other malaria-endemic countries will quickly follow suit.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望其它有瘧疾流行疫情的國家也儘快照做”。

sentences.english: The current wave of cholera outbreaks affecting Central Africa started a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 目前影響中部非洲的這一波霍亂疫情始自幾個月前。

sentences.english: The virus may cause epidemic polyarthritis which can be extremely debilitating.
sentences.chinese: 病毒可能會導致疫情多發性關節炎，可以非常衰弱。

sentences.english: Unless those practices are modified or changed, the risk of recurrent infection remains high.
sentences.chinese: 除非改進或轉變做法，否則疫情復發的危險仍將很高。

sentences.english: The national capital, Skopje, has been most affected by the outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 首都斯科普里是受疫情影響最嚴重的地區。

sentences.english: But Troedsson says there have been no major outbreaks of disease in the affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 不過韓卓升說，災區沒有爆發重大的疫情。

sentences.english: It was the result of regulatory inaction and infighting.
sentences.chinese: 此次疫情是政府監管不力和內訌的結果。
